portfolio.title: Responsive Landing Page
portfolio.description: I developed this Responsive Landing Page on Supercars related News on ReactJs, while including HTML, CSS, JS. In which when scroll or hover on navbar it will change color etc.

portfolio.title: Stopwatch
portfolio.description: I create a stopwatch webapp with ReactJs including HTML, CSS, JS. Functionallities are working like normal stopwatch like starting, pausing, reseting and display lap times.

portfolio.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
portfolio.description: I create an Interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game webapp with ReactJs including HTML, CSS, JS. Functionallities to handle clicks, track game state, and check for winning conditions.
